selectListener - Class in displays

standardMove(int, int) - Method in class pieces.Pawn
This method checks if the player is moving their pawn in the right direction based on the pieces color and also ensures that if they move two spaces, it is only on the first move.
standardMove(int, int) - Method in class pieces.Piece
This method returns a boolean depending on if the piece is moved in a way that it is intended to move, both state specific move or as it generally is moved.
standardMove(int, int) - Method in class pieces.Queen
Because the queen utilizes the Rook and Bishop implementation of standardMove(), this method should never be called.
